children.text: The box gutter in this area has been constructed with a change of direction, creating a weak point in the gutter design that is susceptible to leaking.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Box Gutter Design Fact Sheet states that
‘Box gutters must discharge at the downstream end without change in direction (i.e. not to the side)’ .
This box gutter must be re-constructed to ensure proper water discharge in accordance with Australian Standard AS 3500 – Plumbing and Drainage.
